response.name: Sarah Chen
response.summary: Dr. Sarah Chen is the lead AI researcher at Stanford University, specializing in transformer architectures. Her research focuses on enhancing computational efficiency while maintaining model performance. She actively collaborates with researchers from MIT and has an extensive publication record with over 50 papers in top-tier conferences.
